layout.singingstanza: Ex -- er -- cise the spir -- it, Soul -- ish life de -- ny; Take this as our se -- cret, Live and walk there -- by.

lyrics.stanza: Exercise the spirit, Soulish life deny; Take this as our secret, Live and walk thereby.
Exercise the spirit, Outward rules renounce; Follow the anointing, Make each moment count.
Exercise the spirit, Cast aside self will; In the light of life, let Christ be all in all.
Exercise the spirit, Soul reject anon; Thus we praise and worship, All our problems gone.
Exercise the spirit, Thus Christ has the way; Exercise the spirit, Riches we partake.
Exercise the spirit, Thus the Lord to touch; Exercise the spirit We are builded thus.
Exercise the spirit, This the Lord desires; Exercise the spirit, He'll be glorified.
